txt.en: The Shatorthum Troll-handler can be found in the heart of Shatorthum in the north-western Westfold.\n\nYou should defeat the Troll-handler and learn of his plans for the assault.
The Shatorthum Troll-handler can be found in the heart of Shatorthum in the north-western Westfold.\n\nYou should defeat the Troll-handler and learn of his plans for the assault.
You have discovered a note on the Shatorthum Troll-handler's corpse.\n\nYou should read the note.
You have stalled a disastrous siege intended to crush Rohan once and for all, hopefully saving many lives.
You learn that this siege was intended to stop only briefly to break down the walls of Helm's Deep, and then proceed to crush Meduseld
Learn of the Troll-handler's plans for the siege
You have stalled a disastrous siege intended to crush Rohan once and for all, hopefully saving many lives.
At the heart of Shatorthum sits a cunning Uruk who intends to lead the trolls and their siege-weapons against the Rohirrim. You should learn of the Shatorthum Troll-handler's plans.
At the heart of Shatorthum sits a cunning Uruk who intends to lead the trolls and their siege-weapons against the Rohirrim. You should learn of the Shatorthum Troll-handler's plans.
You have collected the Troll-handler's siege-orders
Learn of <URUK TBD's> plans for the siege
